name: Love Will Tear Us Apart
description: Corey has his lawyer arrange a meeting to see his daughters. With their relationship at an end, Leah spends her first night alone without her girls and moves her things out of Corey's place. Jennelle has a hard time adjusting to life in rehab, especially when she discovers she may be bi-polar. She returns to baby Jace with renewed optimism. Chelsea passes her first exam. Kailyn comes clean to Jordan about sleeping with Jo and as their relationship ends, she tries to come to grips with her feelings for Jo.
